en.title: Causes and Remedies for Cat Vomiting: How to Tell When It's Serious
en.content:
Cats vomit relatively often, but not all vomiting is normal. It is important to know the signs of concerning vomiting.

Vomiting That Is Usually Not a Concern

Vomiting hairballs (a few times a year), regurgitating undigested food after eating too fast, and vomiting after eating grass are common behaviors in cats. If the cat is otherwise energetic afterward, there is usually little cause for worry.

Vomiting That Requires Immediate Veterinary Attention

Visit an animal hospital immediately in the following cases:

  • Repeated vomiting multiple times in a single day
  • Blood is present in the vomit
  • The cat is lethargic and lacks energy
  • Persistent vomiting on an empty stomach (yellow bile-like liquid)
  • There is a possibility the cat swallowed a foreign object
  • Loss of appetite lasting more than 2 days

Preventing Vomiting

Using a puzzle feeder to prevent fast eating, regular brushing for hairball prevention, and choosing the right food all help reduce the frequency of vomiting.

zh.title: 猫咪呕吐的原因与应对方法：如何分辨需要担心的呕吐
zh.content:
猫咪相对经常呕吐，但并非所有呕吐都是正常的。了解需要警惕的呕吐信号非常重要。

不太需要担心的呕吐

吐毛球（一年几次）、吃太快后吐出未消化的猫粮、吃草后呕吐等，都是猫咪常见的行为。如果之后精神状态良好，通常不必太担心。

需要立即就医的呕吐

出现以下情况请立即前往动物医院：

  • 一天内多次反复呕吐
  • 呕吐物中带血
  • 精神萎靡、没有活力
  • 空腹状态下持续呕吐（黄色胆汁样液体）
  • 可能误食了异物
  • 食欲不振持续超过2天

呕吐的预防

使用慢食碗防止进食过快、定期梳毛预防毛球、选择合适的猫粮，都有助于减少呕吐的发生。
